publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1314 Donald Gorrie: A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building-That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body should discuss with Oxfam the possibility of siting one of its new fair trade coffee shops in or near the Parliament building to serve MSPs, staff and visitors.
S2M-1314 A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 14 May 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1314 A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 14 May 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1314 A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 14 May 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1314 A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 14 May 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1314 A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 14 May 2004) Mark Ballard*
S2M-1314 A Fair Trade Coffee Shop for the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 14 May 2004) Elaine Smith*
